actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to repeal section 108A of the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 which allows participation by Federal employees in certain cultural exchange programs financed by foreign government.

summary.text: Amends the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to disallow Federal employees to accept grants and other types of assistance provided by a foreign government to facilitate participation of such employees in certain cultural exchange programs.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 108A of the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 which allows participation by Federal employees in certain cultural exchange programs financed by foreign government.
